name: Enemy Attack Online(Testing Multiplayer )Version
description:
The assignment for this project was to create a game that can be played online with another person. 

This project though me how to do this by taking an existing project and recreating it from scratch so that it would work as a multiplayer game. By learning how to use the Mirror with UNITY and the code to make it work. The pictures above are proof of what I learn by making this game work.

This is one of these lessons that I will be using on my next project to get better at making these type of multiplayer games and it was beneficiall to me because this is was one of the things that I wanted to learn and i was able to learn that with this lesson.
